review: I really liked the excursion, I discovered many villages, customs, Tunisian dishes and traditions. The experience in the oasis and desert has been wonderful and rewarding, it fell short. I hope to return very soon!!!

Our guide who was excellent. He was easy to understand and clearly could have told us much more about the sites than we had time for. Despite asking many questions, we were not able to stump him! We highly recommend both SaharanSky and Rafik.

Great day !! Atmosphere at the top and the landscape...Magnificent!! Do not take into account the negative comments which make me doubt...fortunately because we would have missed a fantastic moment! Thanks again to the organizers üéâüòÅ
Very interesting tour. Short but you can see the most important places to visit. I very recommended.

A visit rich in history and very well orchestrated thanks to the professionalism of our guide Rafik A passionate about history and culture who gives him a key line for this visit. I highly recommend it!

We absolutely loved the experience. The guide and the driver were pleasant, spoke very good French and showed us really beautiful things. Some weren't even on the schedule! A professional, exceptional team and golden activities. I recommend this travel agency 100%.

We came to Tunis not knowing much about what to do or where to go, which made it difficult to get around given we don‚Äôt speak Arabic or French. I booked a half day tour with Saharansky to see Sidi Bou Said and Carthage with a private tour guide and driver. Our tour guide was Kais and our driver was Saif. Both were wonderful. Kais helped us understand the history, culture and wonders of Tunisia. Saif was great as well, the air conditioned car was welcome during the 35 degree heat and humidity. We had such a great time we booked a cooking class the next day with Irina and a local Tunisian woman in her home. Saif was our driver again. Irina took us grocery shopping (the souk was closed the day we took the class). We made cous cous, Slata Mechoia (roasted red pepper and tomato sauce) and Brick (fried squares with filling). It was wonderful to see a Tunisian household, she was so welcoming, giving and warm, and made us feel at home. She even gave us some cous cous to take home with us. We ate so much we couldn‚Äôt eat dinner! Thank you Saharansky for making our trip!

Monastir was a little cold in wet in December but the history of the city for outweighed the slight inconvenience of rain. The ribat is super impressive as well as the significant site of Habib Bourguiba's mausoleum in the city. Nice and pleasant city to stroll around in. The company was accommodating and we were able to start the tour earlier on the day.
Two very pleasant cities to visit, with a friendly and competent guide with a very comfortable private car!

3 very full days, with the crossing of grandiose landscapes, the visit of exceptional sites, original activities and surprises! We were 2 tourists in the 4X4, an Englishman and me, from Quebec, in addition to the driver and the guide. The latter spoke 5 languages and had been practicing the profession for more than 20 years. He loved his job and the story; he knew a lot about the regions we passed through. Bring a tuque for the night in the tent in the desert.

On top excellent organization driver and super 4x4 our guide Hassan was passionate and exciting the best ever met The well chosen places The little extra they were able to adapt to our requests and modify according to our wishes Be careful the place at the bottom is not very comfortable for the great legs

Thanks to this amazing duo!! They are complementary: Aymen for the explanations, the history, the cultural side and Zizou for the animation, the anecdotes. These guides accompanied us for a meal at the troglodyte homestay, a camel trek in the desert and a night in a tent with entertainment, meals, campfire, dances, songs. Also visits to a star wars site, the Colosseum of El jem and finally an oasis with hot spring !! They are friendly, honest, very nice you can trust them! Thank you again for these beautiful memories!!
Nice overview of Monastir and Sousse with an attentive and very interesting guide We recommend!

The guide was a most impressive woman who loved every moment of living and was so proud to show me the sites in her City. It was an excellent tour and I saw so much! The only downside was taking me to a couple of places where there was pressure to buy things.
We visited a mountain range and one filming location (Mos Espa). Advertising is a bit misleading. I wish we could have seen more.
Great time beautiful landscape the locals are general Brilliant guide speaks French very well with the super friendly uncle I recommend

Amazing tour, my guide Mohamed went through extra effort to make sure I enjoyed the tour because of issues with the Bardo Museum being temporarily closed. He was very informative about all the sites. I saw plenty of things that I never would have experienced had I not done this tour. Highly recommended!
Our guide was fabulous. He had great English, was very friendly, and provided lots of information. He had no trouble going off script to answer questions. He was our favorite part of Tunis.
Beoutifoul tour and excellent guide. Only one suggestion: in Sidi bou Said, prices are very high. Request guide help if you want to purchase souvenir.
